Japan's space programs and moon missionsJapan aims to become the fifth country to put a spacecraft on the moon when it tries a precision landing on Friday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 23:04:29 GMT U23F2AJIEBNULJOSGD3NJN5WQM https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/japans-space-programs-moon-missions-2024-01-18/Kantaro Komiya技术空间
Canada police suspect India link in Alberta extortion ringPolice in Canada are investigating a series of extortions and related crimes that they believe are orchestrated by a suspect in India and involve criminals in Edmonton, Alberta, targeting the region's affluent South Asian people. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 22:18:11 GMT 6PJY3BN5D5J5RECUTXV7PPSTPM https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-police-suspect-india-link-alberta-extortion-ring-2024-01-18/Ismail Shakil世界
Israeli cabinet minister says he prevented strike on Hezbollah in days after Hamas attackIsraeli cabinet minister and former military chief Gadi Eizenkot told Israel's Channel 12 on Thursday that he prevented Israel from preemptively attacking Hezbollah in Lebanon in the days after Hamas' deadly Oct. 7 onslaught on southern Israel. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 22:02:52 GMT 4CDU5H6Y2BLZVAKQFZ6SLIGVME https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-cabinet-minister-says-he-prevented-strike-hezbollah-days-after-hamas-2024-01-18/Reuters世界中东
Port-Au-Prince residents sheltering in place as violence escalatesHaiti's capital Port-au-Prince was on lockdown on Thursday, as flaming barricades across several neighborhoods forced residents to shelter in place or return home in the latest flare-ups in chronic gang violence plaguing the Caribbean country. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:56:30 GMT K3BNSRLNJ5NYXF3ARCTWAOUK7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/port-au-prince-residents-sheltering-place-violence-escalates-2024-01-18/Reuters世界美洲
US urges discussions with China on practical nuclear risk reduction stepsThe United States does not expect formal nuclear arms-control negotiations with China anytime soon, but does want to see a start of discussions on practical risk-reduction measures, a senior White House official said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:24:07 GMT SBBOZ2QLRJLLRABKQGZHHXITQU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-urges-discussions-with-china-practical-nuclear-risk-reduction-steps-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
US says 'no way' to solve Israel security, Gaza war without Palestinian stateThere is "no way" to solve Israel's long-term security challenges in the region and the short-term challenges of rebuilding Gaza without the establishment of a Palestinian state, U.S. State Department spokesperson Matthew Miller said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:16:50 GMT 6GUEP6XSOVIGTCGTTACSEO22JY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-says-no-way-solve-israel-security-gaza-war-without-palestinian-state-2024-01-18/Simon Lewis, Humeyra Pamuk世界中东
Iran-Pakistan flare-up rooted in restive borderlands, not Mideast strifeAn Iranian strike on Pakistan this week that drew a rapid military riposte and raised fears of greater regional turmoil was driven by Iran's efforts to reinforce its internal security rather than its ambitions for the Middle East, according to three Iranian officials, one Iranian insider and an analyst. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:10:59 GMT 6XD6DWILZRKIZFH46PNETWKETY https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-pakistan-flare-up-rooted-restive-borderlands-not-mideast-strife-2024-01-18/Parisa Hafezi, Charlotte Greenfield, Gibran Peshimam世界
US-owned bulk carrier approached by drones off Yemen -British security firmBritish maritime security firm Ambrey on Thursday said that a Marshall Islands-flagged US-owned bulk carrier reported that four unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) approached and circled the vessel approximately 87 miles southeast of Yemen's city of Mukalla. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:09:36 GMT HVMQ5P3Y4NILHDD7DD6VMQFMUY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-owned-bulk-carrier-approached-by-drones-off-yemen-british-security-firm-2024-01-18/Reuters世界中东
UN chief urges maximum restraint by Iran, PakistanUnited Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres urged Iran and Pakistan to "exercise maximum restraint to avoid a further escalation of tensions" after an exchange of military strikes between the countries, his spokesperson said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 19:26:59 GMT YT3FKDOX5NLB3AARL574TIPVXU https://www.reuters.com/world/un-chief-urges-maximum-restraint-by-iran-pakistan-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
US targets more Houthi anti-ship missiles aimed at Red SeaThe United States launched additional strikes early on Thursday targeting two Houthi anti-ship missiles that were being prepared to fire into the Red Sea and deemed "an imminent threat" to shipping and U.S. Navy vessels in the region, the U.S. military said. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 19:06:59 GMT 5DFSIV5GCVKG5CWVQO2PQQRVH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-targets-more-houthi-anti-ship-missiles-aimed-red-sea-2024-01-18/Reuters世界中东
What is behind Iran-Pakistan attacks and could conflict escalate?Iran launched missile strikes on three different countries this week - Iraq, Syria and Pakistan - while proxy militant groups it backs continue to target U.S. and Western interests and fight Israel, stoking fears of conflict that could engulf the Middle East and spread to other regions. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 18:43:57 GMT I5UMFP47SVPDXNEGOOBXUWHXFA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-its-proxies-widening-violence-middle-east-2024-01-18/John Davison世界中东
